definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the pathological characteristics of heroin spongiform leukoencephalopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解海洛因海绵状白质脑病的病理特征。

sentences.english: Heroin has been smuggled out by sea.
sentences.chinese: 海洛因已从海上偷运出境。

sentences.english: Objectives: To understand relapse reasons and related factors of Heroin addicts.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解海洛因依赖者复吸原因及其相关因素。

sentences.english: Day. 1725】She used to be a heroin addict, but now she is clean.
sentences.chinese: 她过去是一位海洛因毒瘾患者，但是她现在戒毒了。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo research the influencing factor protracted withdrawal symptom of heroin addicts.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解海洛因依赖者稽延症状及其影响因素。

sentences.english: They even forced him to take heroin.
sentences.chinese: 他们甚至强迫他吸食海洛因。

sentences.english: In 1970, high-grade heroin and opium flooded Southeast Asia.
sentences.chinese: 1970年东南亚的高纯度海洛因和鸦片泛滥成灾。

sentences.english: For the last 4 months, my partner and I have been recreationally using heroin.
sentences.chinese: 上4个月，我的女友和我为了取乐而吸食了海洛因。

sentences.english: And I believe you can get that fag he-man star of mine off heroin.
sentences.chinese: 我也相信你可以让我那个不争气的男明星远离海洛因。

sentences.english: Purpose:To identify the"specific"neuro-anatomy structure in cue-elicited heroin craving.
sentences.chinese: 目的识别线索诱发海洛因渴求参与的特异脑功能区。

sentences.english: The police found much heroin hoarded  in his store.
sentences.chinese: 警方找到了他藏在他店中的大量的海洛因。
诊所使服用海洛因的人戒去毒瘾。

sentences.english: Cocaine and heroin are fast routes to perdition.
sentences.chinese: 可卡因和海洛因是通往地狱的快车道。

sentences.english: Obiective To study the psychology status of heroin addicts in Haikou city.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解海口市海洛因依赖者心理健康状况。

sentences.english: Of these options, the most commonly used in the intravenous injection.
sentences.chinese: 最常见使用海洛因的方法就是静脉内注射。

sentences.english: Objective: To evaluate the clinical features of mental symptoms in diamorphine dependent patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨海洛因依赖患者出现精神症状的临床特点。

definition: cocaine (loanword)/also written 可卡因[ke3 ka3 yin1]
